Question: As one of his first presidential acts, this person asked Congress to create the Peace Corps.
Hints: McGeorge Bundy drafted a National Security Action Memo to present to this person upon his return from Dallas.
A week earlier, this person had proposed that Congress tighten the conflict of interest laws.
This person added that the top rate should be set at 70 percent if certain deductions were not eliminated for high income earners.
